select member.id, blog_name, profile_img, nickname, statement_msg, visible_email, github, website, nvl(following_cnt,0) following_cnt, nvl(follower_cnt,0) follower_cnt, nvl(post_cnt,0) post_cnt from member, (select id, count(following_id) following_cnt from following where id=#{id} group by id) following_t, (select id, count(follower_id) follower_cnt from follower where id=#{id} group by id) follower_t, (select id, count(id) post_cnt from post where id=#{id} and delete_Flag='F' and publish_Flag='T'
and hidden_flag='F'
group by id) post_t where member.id=#{id} and member.id=following_t.id(+) and member.id=follower_t.id(+) and member.id=post_t.id(+)

select post_num, thumbnail, post_title, post_content, view_cnt, hidden_flag, to_char(input_date, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') input_date, nvl(comm_cnt,0) comm_cnt from (select post.post_num, thumbnail, post_title, post_content, view_cnt, hidden_flag, input_date, comm_cnt, row_number() over(order by input_date desc) rnum from post, (select post.post_num, count(comm.post_num) comm_cnt from post,comm where post.post_num=comm.post_num and comm.delete_flag='F' and post.id=#{id} group by post.post_num) comm where post.post_num=comm.post_num(+) and delete_flag='F'
and hidden_flag='F'
and (post_title like '%'||#{column_value}||'%' or post_content like '%'||#{column_value}||'%')
and post.id=#{id}) where rnum between #{start_num} and #{end_num}
